name: Valkyrie Helm [1]
description: The helmet of Odin's servant, "War Girl", it has an ornate accessory with unfolded wings.

name: Valkyrie Helm [1] Blueprint
description: "Battle Girl's" Helmet that served Odin. It represents the gorgeous decoration of flying wings. Show the hidden Str when you gather all the groups of Valkyrie Randgris.

name: Valkyrie Manteau [1]
description: The cloak of Odin's servant, "War Girl", gorgeous and light.

name: Valkyrie Manteau [2]
description: The cloak of Odin's servant, "War Girl", gorgeous and light.

name: Valkyrie Shoes [1]
description: The boots of Odin's servant, "War Girl", its ability grows with the wearer.

name: Valkyrie Shoes [2]
description: The boots of Odin's servant, "War Girl", its ability grows with the wearer.

name: Valkyrie's Gift
description: Valkyrie provides warriors with kisses, love and fighting power. (Use it to guild contribution: 500 points)

name: Valkyrie's Guidance Chest
description: The blessing guide of Valkyrie, You can use it to receive Guild's Gift x5, Gold Medal x1

name: Valkyrja's Shield [2]
description: The shield used by Gothenar, Blig's subordinate god, during the battle in Bakilia. Through it you can sense the fighting spirit of Bakilia warrior.

name: Valkyrja's Shield[1]
description: The shield used by Gothenar, Blig's subordinate god, during the battle in Bakilia. Through it you can sense the fighting spirit of Bakilia warrior.

name: Vane Hairpin [1]
description: The childhood feelings of chasing after kites are still vivid. Although we cannot go back, we can continue to be playful children at least.

name: Vane Hairpin [1] Blueprint
description: The childhood feelings of chasing after kites are still vivid. Although we cannot go back, we can continue to be playful children at least.

name: Variant Shoes [1]
description: Weird-designed boots that indicates the maker's intention to challenge the God, but the function was changed because the purpose was not achieved.
